issue.title: [C++] Create enumerating generator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12287](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12287). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With parallel readahead items may get returned out of order.  An enumerating future can be used to tag items prior to the parallel readahead so that they can later be reassembled.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12287?focusedCommentId=17320964) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9945
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9945>
